MemoryInfobox.description: 'Athens|Athenians in Spartan territory could not rest easy once the enemy soldiers were dead. This is the story of a woman who hired Mercenary|mercenaries against the Athenians.'

General_Description: '''Rage of a Spartan''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A woman hired Kassandra to deal with an [[Athens|Athenian]] Commander.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're the one who left the message on the [[Message board|board]]. What's going on?''
*'''Woman:''' ''The Athenians defeated the soldiers and killed most of the men. But they are fools if they think they are safe now.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What are you planning?''
*'''Woman:''' ''[[Sparta]]n women are not like weak Athenian women. We have [[Drachma|money]], and property, and rage. I will use all to strike at their commanders, soldiers, and fleet.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Of course. You want me to deal with the Athenian commander.''
*'''Woman:''' ''Are you up for it?''
(Accept – The commander's head is mine.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll handle this.''
*'''Woman:''' ''You truly are sent by the gods.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll come back when I'm done.''
Kassandra left the woman, and sought out the commander, killing him before returning to the woman.
*'''Woman:''' ''You again. Have you killed him?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Your man is dead.''
*'''Woman:''' ''You've earned your payment, ''misthios''. Here. This is for you.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra dealt with the Athenian Commander, and was rewarded for it.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
